name.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: TemuSave | Download Temu Images and Videos

short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Download all Images & Videos from Temu product detail pages with ease.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Save Temu Images & Videos, the go-to tool for seamless downloads!

Our extension empowers you to effortlessly download high-quality images and videos from Temu directly to your computer. Experience the convenience of one-click downloads and elevate your product browsing to the next level.

▬▬▬▬ GETTING STARTED ▬▬▬▬▬

1. Install the extension with a simple click on the 'Add to Chrome' button.
2. Navigate to any Temu product page.
3. Pin the TemuSave icon to your browser's extension bar for quick access.
4. Start downloading with ease!

▬▬▬▬▬ FEATURES ▬▬▬▬▬

With the FREE version, you can:

- Download main product images, variant images, and description pictures.
- Download product videos effortlessly.
- Organize downloads into subdirectories.
- Ensure the best quality with high-resolution image downloads.
- Convert webp images to JPEG format.
- Automatically open the download directory post-download.

▬▬▬▬▬ NEED HELP? ▬▬▬▬▬

Questions or suggestions? We're here to help! Reach out to us at temudownloader@gmail.com.

▬▬▬▬ DISCLAIMER ▬▬▬▬▬

Please note, this extension is NOT affiliated with or endorsed by Temu. Enjoy a more efficient shopping experience.
